title: US and China reached a trade agreement, but some key details are still unclear

title: Asian shares up as investors cheer 'phase one' Sino-U.S. trade deal
text: A broad gauge of Asian share markets hit nearly eight-month highs on Monday after the United States and China agreed a preliminary trade deal, and amid policy-easing hopes in Australia, but profit-taking and caution over the deal's details capped gains.

title: Oil prices fall as investors seek clarity on U.S.-China trade deal
text: Oil prices on Monday slid off near three-month highs hit last week as investors searched for clarity beyond the initial impact of a trade deal between the United States and China that's expected to boost flows between the top two global economies.

title: Asian markets quiet as investors shrug off the US-China trade deal

title: Oil prices fall - but hold near three-month high on trade deal agreement
text: Oil prices fell but remained near three-month highs on Monday after the United States and China agreed to an initial trade deal, a move market participants said could stoke oil demand and boost trade flows.

title: China and U.S. should continue trade talks, remove tariffs: stats bureau
text: China and the United States should continue bilateral trade talks and work toward removing all existing tariffs, China's National Bureau of Statistics spokesman Fu Linghui said on Monday.
